summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackAchieve healthy, ultra-clean skin with a double cleansing regimen that begins with Dermalogica Precleanse Cleansing Oil. Crafted with vitamin E and vitamin C, this cleansing oil helps to gently remove make-up, sunscreen and impurities from skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsMelt away makeup, sunscreen and daily pollution build-up, with the Double Cleanse regimen that begins with this Dermalogica Best SellerThis plant-based cleansing oil is lightweightGreat for all skin types and can be used around the eye area to wash away even the toughest waterproof mascara without leaving a residueComplete your Double Cleanse regimen with Dermalogica's Special Cleansing Gel (sold separately) to help you achieve ultra-squeaky-clean skinKey IngredientsVitamin E: nourishes and protects skin from damageRice Bran: rich in oryzanol which is high in antioxidants and packed with B vitamins to soften skinKukui Nut: abundant source of vitamin A, vitamin C, vitamin E, and omega 3 fatty acids that reinforce the protective skin barrierItem 2152625How To UseDispense into dry hands and massage over dry face and eyes to dissolve surface oil and dirt. Concentrate on areas of congestion or stubborn debris. Wet hands and continue massaging to create a light, milky emulsion. Rinse with lukewarm water and follow with Special Cleansing Gel (sold separately).IngredientsCaprylic/Capric Triglyceride, PEG-40 Sorbitan Peroleate, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Aleurites Moluccanus Seed Oil, Cymbopogon Citratus Leaf Oil, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Citral, Limonene, Linalool.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Dispense into dry hands and massage over dry face and eyes to dissolve surface oil and dirt. Concentrate on areas of congestion or stubborn debris. Wet hands and continue massaging to create a light, milky emulsion. Rinse with lukewarm water and follow with Special Cleansing Gel (sold separately).
